description:
不知道各位童鞋在商务洽谈中有木有遇到这种情况，就是当你要去形容产品质量、外形、销路好的时候，明明脑里都出现了各种丰富中文词语，可是就是不知道用英语怎么表达，内心真的好焦急呀！不怕，那面英语君给大家列出一些在洽谈中一定用的上的短语！

一、质量篇
（1） 经久耐用 durable in use
e.g. Customers like the goods durable in use.顾客喜欢经久耐用的商品。
e.g. Made by the whole stainless steel, airproof and resist alkali, and be durable in use.全不锈钢制作，耐酸碱，经久耐用。可配置自动加热恒温装置。

（2） 久负盛名 long-standing reputation
e.g. That company has a long standing reputation for quality service and dependability.那个公司在服务的品质和可信度上，有着长久的信誉。

（3） 经济实惠 economical and practical
e.g. Synonymous with freshness, hygiene and conviviality, the individual cream portions are also economical and practical.独立包装奶不仅仅是新鲜、卫生、欢乐的代名词，同时也是非常经济实用的。
e.g. The new-pattern fur dresses of this winter show originality and are economical and practical.今冬新款皮装，独特创意，经济实惠。

（4） 保质保量 quality and quantity assured
e.g. Ensure the products can be produced by required quality and quantity.确保产品能够按照生产计划保质保量的被生产出来。
e.g. We plant with advanced equipment, scientific management, the quality and quantity delivered on time.我们厂拥有先进的设备，科学的管理，保质保量准时交货。

（5） 品质优良 fine quality
e.g. Fine quality as well as low price will help push the sales of.优良的质量和较低的价格有助于推产品。
e.g. Fine quality as well as low price will help push the sale of your product.质优价廉将有助于推销你们的产品。
（6） 性能可靠 dependable performance
e.g. When selecting Sure-Shot Game Calls, you will know you have the best in quality, craftsmanship, true tone, and dependable performance.使用过这款猎哨后,你将发现无论是质量，工艺,音质及实际功能方面,它都是你最佳选择。

（7） 用料上乘 selected materials

e.g. Thanks to their diversities and original styles, selected materials and fine workmanship, the products are popular in Japan, Korea, European countries, United states and Hong Kong.产品丰富多样，用料考究，做工细致，款式新颖大方，价廉物美，质量保证，远销日本、韩国、欧美、香港等地区和国家。

（8） 经济耐用 economy and durability
e.g. They excel for their workmanship, color, design, economy and durability.制品工艺精湛，色彩鲜艳，图案丰富多采，经济耐用。

（9） 工艺精良 sophisticated technologies
e.g. It produces its products with widely acknowledged fame domestically and internationally- "unique ingredients, quality materials, sophisticated technologies, evident therapy".所制产品以"配方独特,选料上乘,工艺精湛,疗效显著"而驰名中外。

（10） 货真价实 goods genuine and price reasonable
e.g. The basic moral tenet governing the conduct of business is that the goods should be genuine and the price fair.货真价实是经商的基本道德。
